lilliurlian

Class ShortenerResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • lilliurlian.ShortenerResource

  • public class ShortenerResource
extends java.lang.Object
    This class works as server interface for client requests using Spark methods.
    Author:
    GruppoPDBMNG-14

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShortenerResource

        public ShortenerResource(ShortenerService shortenerService)
        Constructs a new listening service for incoming requests, initializing the DAO and setting endpoints.
        Parameters:
        shortenerService - Access to DAO is given to let the server manage write/read client requests.

    • Method Detail

      • setupEndpoints

        private void setupEndpoints()
        Sets how the server reacts to each specific request. Spark method put and get are used to let client communicate with server.
